description: H with two horizontal bars across the middle, with vertical lines dropping down from the crossbar. All connected by a short diagonal to a tall vertical stroke on left

features.description: How many vertical lines are in the 'box' in the bottom?
Is the top of the H solid with crosshatching? 0 = no, 1 = yes
Is the shape a discernable animal? 0 = no, 1 = yes
